explains: n. 林下灌木丛；矮树丛

sentences.en: A flashlight beam probed the underbrush only yards away from their hiding place.
sentences.cn: 一束手电光搜索了离他们藏身之处仅几码远的低矮灌丛。

sentences.en: Thick underbrush was growing there, sheltering thousands of insects and lizards.
sentences.cn: 茂密的灌木丛里住着成千上万的昆虫和蜥蜴。

sentences.en: The unintentional consequence has been to halt the natural eradication of underbrush, now the primary fuel for megafires.
sentences.cn: 意外\的后果是阻止了对灌木丛的天然清理，而它们现在成了超级大火的最主要的燃料。
